video.title: The Game
video.synopsis: A pro footballer's life is hard, but it may be as hard on their women, as a medical student finds after leaving school to follow her boyfriend.

episodes.synopsis: Melanie and Derwin attend a party where Melanie has a conversation with another player and is perceived to be flirting with him.
episodes.title: The Rules of the Game

episodes.synopsis: When Melanie sends gifts to the football team on behalf of Derwin, he gets teased and his teammates reciprocate. A gift-giving competition ensues.
episodes.title: Gifted

episodes.synopsis: When Malik tells Tasha that he is having trouble with the offensive coordinator, Kenny, he asks her to speak with him.
episodes.title: How Tasha Got Her Groove Back

episodes.synopsis: When Kelly's daughter says she wants a birthday party, Kelly approaches Jason for money. Malik gets beaten in an Xbox game and asks for a rematch.
episodes.title: Brittany's Super Sweet Sixth

episodes.synopsis: A minor argument escalates into a major locker room rift between Jason and Malik that affects their playing relationship on the field.
episodes.title: Rift and Separate

episodes.synopsis: When Tasha returns early from a trip, she finds Malik throwing a party. Fed up with his mom running his life, Malik asks her to find her own place.
episodes.title: Mi Casa Es Su Casa

episodes.synopsis: When Derwin's image consultant wants to pair Derwin with football player Trey Wiggs, he objects, saying he and Trey were more rivals than teammates.
episodes.title: The Trey Wiggs Episode

episodes.synopsis: Derwin hates Melanie's friendship with an old rival, so she tries making it up to him. When Derwin refuses to acknowledge it, Melanie starts packing.
episodes.title: The Trey Wiggs Fallout Episode

episodes.synopsis: The Sabers lose, and Melanie looks forward to going home. When the Sabers discover they have a chance at the playoffs, Derwin asks Melanie to stay.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: When Kelly attempts to please Jason, take care of her daughter and impress Jason's visiting parents, she overworks herself and has a breakdown.
episodes.title: It's Hard Being Kelly Pitts

episodes.synopsis: Derwin proposes to Melanie after they discover she might be pregnant.
episodes.title: To Baby... or not to Baby

episodes.synopsis: Derwin's performance gains attention from a manager. Derwin considers a trade to Chicago. Malik takes the loss hard and raps to vent his feelings.
episodes.title: The Iceman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: When Jason isn't selected for the Pro Bowl, he questions his future. Malik is selected for the Pro Bowl but decides not to take Tasha with him.
episodes.title: All-Star Blues

episodes.synopsis: When Malik finds out that the love of his life is getting married, he uses Drew to make Eva jealous. Drew turns to Derwin as a shoulder to cry on.
episodes.title: Out of Bounds

episodes.synopsis: Kelly is happy Jason wants another baby -- until Tasha offers her a job. When Drew calls Derwin, he realizes their flirtation has gone too far.
episodes.title: Baby B.S.

episodes.synopsis: When Melanie gives shelter to a Sunbeam whose boyfriend left her, Melanie feels uncomfortable about being dependent on Derwin for financial security.
episodes.title: God Bless the Girl That's Got Her Own

episodes.synopsis: Camille joins the Sunbeams and runs against Kelly. Kelly expects Tasha's vote, but Tasha wants Kelly to devote her time to being her assistant.
episodes.title: You Say You Want a Revolution

episodes.synopsis: Tasha's boyfriend, Kenny, confronts her about her aggressive attitude and asks her to tone it down when he introduces her to his group of friends.
episodes.title: The Big Chill

episodes.synopsis: When Derwin is forced to take Melanie to singer Drew Sidora's video release party, he panics over how the meeting between them is going to turn out.
episodes.title: The Many Lies of Derwin Davis

episodes.synopsis: During ESPY week, Derwin gets an unexpected endorsement deal and is left to celebrate with Drew Sidora while Melanie is busy studying in San Diego.
episodes.title: When the Chicken Comes Home to Roost: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Malik asks Tasha for advice about Renee. Jason is asked to conduct interviews for ESPN. Melanie and Derwin have an argument about their engagement.
episodes.title: When the Chicken Comes Home to Roost: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Melanie breaks up with Derwin after learning that he cheated on her. Derwin apologizes, but Melanie wants to move out of their apartment.
episodes.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman, Redux

episodes.synopsis: Derwin gets jealous when Melanie has lunch with a friend who is now a rookie sensation. He demands that she stop seeing him, but she refuses.
episodes.title: The Trey Wiggs Taps Back Episode

episodes.synopsis: Renee refuses to be intimate with Malik until he gets a place of his own. Jason hosts a Bible study in an attempt to gain favor with his new coach.
episodes.title: Tasha, Renee and Malik the Cliché

episodes.synopsis: Kelly asks Jason to let her brother stay with them after he's released from rehab. Melanie tries to make Derwin jealous by making brownies for Malik.
episodes.title: Hit Me With Your Best Shot

episodes.synopsis: Derwin wants to propose to Melanie, but when Drew Sidora kisses him on an awards show, it makes Melanie jealous all over again.
episodes.title: Fool Me Twice... I'm The Damn Fool

episodes.synopsis: Tasha informs Melanie she has to find a new place to live. Derwin thinks Melanie slept with Malik. Jason's steroid use causes trouble in the bedroom.
episodes.title: Parental Guidance Suggested

episodes.synopsis: Malik confronts a cartoonist for ridiculing him in a comic. Kelly threatens to leave Jason. Tasha tries to sign a top football player to her agency.
episodes.title: Media Blitz

episodes.synopsis: Malik fires Tasha as his manager after her failed attempt to resolve an embarrassing situation he was involved in.
episodes.title: The Truth Hurts

episodes.synopsis: Derwin brings a new girlfriend to the diner where Melanie is working. Melanie discovers some information about her, but Derwin doesn't believe her.
episodes.title: Turkey Basting Bit**es

episodes.synopsis: Melanie stays to spend the holidays with Dionne after learning that she's alone. When Dionne resurrects an ad deal with Derwin, she abandons Melanie.
episodes.title: The Ghost of Derwin Past

episodes.synopsis: Melanie starts dating a new guy, who doesn't know that she once dated Derwin. Tasha tries to land a deal for Malik to get him back as a client.
episodes.title: Je-Rome Wasn't Built in a Day

episodes.synopsis: Kelly takes Brittany and leaves Jason when he refuses to stop taking steroids. Derwin tries to impress a woman, but she sees through his facade.
episodes.title: Take These Vows and Shove 'Em

episodes.synopsis: Malik is set up on a date with a mean tennis pro (Serena Williams). While Malik tries to control her, Tasha attempts to sign her as a client.
episodes.title: The List Episode

episodes.synopsis: Tasha goes out drinking with her new coworkers and is insulted when one of the managers flashes her. Kelly and Jason see a marriage counselor.
episodes.title: White Men Can't Jump, But They're Definitely Packing

episodes.synopsis: Melanie's relationship with Jerome heats up, but then she discovers that Derwin's new girlfriend has moved in. Jason learns he is going to be benched.
episodes.title: The Commitments

episodes.synopsis: Derwin is injured during a playoff game, and Jason is called on to replace him. Melanie is torn between Derwin and her relationship with Jerome.
episodes.title: Bury My Heart At Wounded Knee

episodes.synopsis: Derwin refuses to attend the victory parade, but Melanie tries to convince him to go. Jason is upset when he isn't offered a contract for next season.
episodes.title: Before the Parade Passes By

episodes.synopsis: Malike goes out with Robin Givens and enjoys her freewheeling approach to life. Meanwhile, Jason sees a therapist when post-championship blues set in.
episodes.title: The Lord Givens and the Lord Taketh Away

episodes.synopsis: Melanie plans a romantic weekend with Jerome, but Derwin and the Sabers party at the same hotel. Malik sulks over breaking up with Robin Givens.
episodes.title: I Got 99 Problems and My Chick is One

episodes.synopsis: Melanie confronts Janay to discover if she is pregnant with Derwin's baby. Kelly plans a girls' night out. Malik tells his mom about his marriage.
episodes.title: Baby on Board

episodes.synopsis: Derwin tells Melanie that Janay is pregnant with his child. Kelly gets help to keep Jason out of her life. Malik hides his marriage from his mom.
episodes.title: Mel-odrama

episodes.synopsis: Tasha keeps her relationship with Rick a secret. Malik realizes his marriage may not work out. Melanie and Derwin's sex life becomes nonexistent.
episodes.title: Just When I Thought I Was Out, She Pulls Me Back In

episodes.synopsis: Melanie gets jealous when Derwin goes with Janay for a pregnancy exam. Kelly and Jason disagree over whether to tell Brittany about their separation.
episodes.title: Just the Three of Us

episodes.synopsis: Robin plans a wedding reception to gain publicity for her marriage to Malik, but Tasha refuses to go. Rick's overprotective mother clashes with Tasha.
episodes.title: A Delectable Basket of Treats

episodes.synopsis: Robin Givens and Malik plan a belated wedding reception, but Tasha decides to boycott the party since she believes their marriage is a sham.
episodes.title: The Platski Thickens

episodes.synopsis: Kelly plans a fun evening out with the girls. Jason goes to a party but finds he has more to regret in the morning than just having too much to drink.
episodes.title: White Coats and White Lies

episodes.synopsis: After a heated argument with Derwin, Melanie concentrates on her work at the hospital, where she becomes attracted to a handsome man.
episodes.title: The Side Part, Under Episode

episodes.synopsis: Tasha starts dating other men. Jason tries to mend his relationship with his daughter, who blames him for the separation from her mom.
episodes.title: Oh, What a Night

episodes.synopsis: Believing her future with Rick Fox is over, Tasha begins dating other men. Melanie is trying to deal with dating two guys at once.
episodes.title: The Negotiation Episode

episodes.synopsis: Jason gets jealous when he sees Kelly on a date. Tasha faces her insecurities regarding Rick Fox. Melanie searches for ways to connect with Derwin.
episodes.title: Insert Car Here

episodes.synopsis: Robin Givens implies that Malik is gay and that it's the reason for their breakup. Malik discovers a teammate is gay but is afraid to come out.
episodes.title: Stay Fierce, Malik

episodes.synopsis: Malik's invitation to appear on a children's television show is suddenly withdrawn when officials think his outing of another player is bad publicity.
episodes.title: Do the Wright Thing

episodes.synopsis: Malik finally meets his father. Derwin and Janay rethink their relationship when they're about to become parents, which isn't good news to Melanie.
episodes.title: Punk Ass Chauncey

episodes.synopsis: Tasha finds out that Rick's job is in jeopardy. Malik is obsessed with learning everything about his father and why they were apart for so long.
episodes.title: Take a Bow

episodes.synopsis: After Kelly betrays Tasha at work, Tasha gets her revenge by introducing Jason to a gorgeous TV personality (Stacey Dash).
episodes.title: Truth and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Janay's ex-boyfriend visits while on a book tour and it makes Derwin jealous. Melanie feels blue and seeks comfort in the arms of her cable guy.
episodes.title: Hill Street Blues

episodes.synopsis: Malik meets his half-sister and worries that he may have slept with her before they knew they were related. Tasha meets her former husband's wife.
episodes.title: The Third Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Derwin proposes to Melanie and she accepts. Tasha and Kelly throw an engagement party for Melanie and Derwin. Jason brings Camille to the party.
episodes.title: Put a Ring on It

episodes.synopsis: Jason wants to introduce his daughter to his new girlfriend. Melanie stumbles upon the perfect wedding dress, but she's reluctant to buy it.
episodes.title: The Fall of the Roman

episodes.synopsis: Melanie tries to marry Derwin before Janay gives birth to Derwin's baby, even if it requires sacrificing her dream wedding.
episodes.title: I Want It All and I Want It Now

episodes.synopsis: Kelly and Jason finally share an emotional moment with each other. Tasha finally admits to setting Jason up with Camille.
episodes.title: The Wedding Episode
